sentences.sContent: The article trivializes the whole issue of equal rights.
sentences.sCn: 文章对平等权利这个大问题轻描淡写。

sentences.sContent: The debate has been trivialized by the media.
sentences.sCn: 那场辩论在媒体的报道中变得无关紧要。

remMethod.val: tri(三) + via(路) + lize → 由一条路变成三条路 → 使显得琐碎； 轻视

words.tran: 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的

trans.tranOther: to make something seem less important or serious than it really is – used to show disapproval
